description: Erection of a mansard roof extension and conversion of existing 6 bedroom house in Multiple Occupation (HMO) (Use Class C4) to a 10 bedroom HMO (Use Class Sui generis) with cycle and refuse storage (part-retrospective).
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0e9602dd-7fff-945d-1899-9a6201757ac4"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">By virtue of the scale and form of the mansard roof extension, the development would result in a poorly designed, overly prominent, and discordant roof level enlargement that would be harmful to the appearance of the host property as well as the architectural character and integrity of the wider row of terraced properties the application site forms part. The development would, thus, be contrary to Policy LP1 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) and the guidance as contained within the </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></span><br></p>

I<span id="docs-internal-guid-04ab4c52-7fff-ff03-38c2-6a22fd1cb1ff"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">n the absence of a Unilateral Undertaking or a Section 106 Agreement (S106) to secure appropriate rent levels in accordance with the Local Housing Allowance, the development would fail to secure the proposed HMO at an affordable rent level, contrary to Policy LP22 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></span>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-80142fbb-7fff-2b3d-65f2-2287408c0b9a"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">In the absence of a Unilateral Undertaking or a Section 106 Agreement securing appropriate mitigation by restricting future occupiers of the development from obtaining parking permits within the CPZ, the proposed development would likely exacerbate existing parking stress and congestion on the surrounding highway network. The development would, therefore, be contrary to Policy LP45 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021).</span></span><br></p>

<p><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve;">By </span></font><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">reason of the inadequate size of the proposed kitchen facilities for 11 persons, which would be in excess of one floor from the lettings to the second floor of the property, and the internal headroom and layout for bedroom ‘Unit 8’, the proposed HMO would fail to provide high-quality accommodation for future occupiers. The proposed development would, therefore, conflict with Policy LP22 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) and the guidance as contained within the Council’s&nbsp; </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Private Rented Property Licensing Accommodation Standards.</span></p>
